TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . He is represented before the ORG by PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the applicant and as they appear from the documents , may be summarised as follows .

The applicant ’s company and another company ( “ T ” ) were business partners . Following an application by the applicant ’s company to that effect , T ’s assets were seized by ORG ( maistraatti , magistraten ) decision in DATE . T appealed . The seizures were upheld by ORG ( hovioikeus , hovrätten ) decision of CARDINAL DATE .

However , in separate civil proceedings , ORG ( käräjäoikeus , tingsrätten ) of GPE , by its decision of CARDINAL DATE , lifted CARDINAL of the seizures . By its judgment of CARDINAL DATE , ORG ruled in favour of the applicant ’s company , ordering T to pay compensation .
On DATE ORG upheld the judgment and overturned ORG decision of CARDINAL DATE , i.e. it ordered that T ’s assets be seized .
Subsequently , ORG ( korkein oikeus , högsta domstolen ) refused leave to appeal . The date of the decision is unspecified , but the decision was referred to in a judgment of DATE by ORG of Espoo .

Following an application of DATE by a company ( “ TM ” ) , owned by the owner of T , winding - up proceedings were instituted against the applicant ’s company before ORG of Helsinki . As TM did not pursue its application , the case was removed from the docket on DATE . This data allegedly remained in the credit information index .

The business of the applicant ’s company dropped , allegedly due to the fact that winding - up proceedings had been instituted against it . Subsequently , on DATE , the applicant himself lodged an application with ORG that his company be wound - up .
On DATE the applicant and others commenced an action for damages against CARDINAL counsel , among others , who had represented T and TM in the above - mentioned proceedings .
By its judgment of DATE ORG of Espoo , having held several hearings and heard witnesses , rejected the action .

The applicant appealed . According to ORG judgment , he filed CARDINAL supplementary submissions during the period from DATE to DATE . He also requested that ORG hold an oral hearing . On DATE ORG , without an oral hearing , rejected the applicant ’s appeal .
On DATE ORG refused the applicant leave to appeal .
